sentences.en: Flight 6 6 5 is now loading for mew york.
sentences.cn: 飞往纽约的635航班现在开始登机.

sentences.en: I simply can not, you see, fit myself to the mew job.
sentences.cn: 我根本无法, 你知道, 适应这个新工作.

sentences.en: Just that I'm going to lose this mew job.
sentences.cn: 只不过我这份新工作要保不住了.

sentences.en: Mew : Ahaha ! Not too shabby, little firefly!
sentences.cn: 啊 哈哈! 小萤火虫,不要太寒酸了.

sentences.en: Mew and Tong were neighbors and close friends in childhood.
sentences.cn: 水电部及塘被邻居和亲密的朋友在童年.

sentences.en: Oh , could you tell mew here the ladies'department is?
sentences.cn: 您能告诉我女士百货在哪里 吗 ?

sentences.en: The tiny kitten approached the enormous bear and let out a purr and a mew.
sentences.cn: 那猫却走近体大腰圆的灰熊,冲它“喵呜“,“喵呜“地叫着.

sentences.en: The tool with the main est apiculture is beehive and mew plinth.

sentences.en: This mew medicine has worked wonders for my stomachache.
sentences.cn: 这种新药治我的胃痛很灵验.

sentences.en: We heard the mew of a cat.
We ring in the mew year with the church bells.
sentences.cn: 我们用教堂的钟声迎来了新年.

sentences.en: We took the mew of a cat as a sound of warning.
sentences.cn: 我们把猫的叫声误听成是警号了.

sentences.en: What do you think of our mew wallpaper?
sentences.cn: 你觉得我们的新墙纸 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: When Cathy got her college diploma, many mew jobs opened up.
sentences.cn: 凯茜获得大学文凭后, 许多工作可供她选择.

sentences.en: When it Mew Mew , to issue the same as the whispering voice.
sentences.cn: 3当它喵喵时, 发出像低语一样的声音.

words.tran_cn: 海鸥；鹰笼；隐匿处；猫叫声

trans.tran_cn: 猫（通常指小猫）或海鸟的叫声
trans.tran_en: any seagull, esp the common gull, Larus canus
